channel.title: Latest Jobs - Gajab Jobs on Gajab Jobs
channel.description: Recent content in Latest Jobs - Gajab Jobs on Gajab Jobs

item.title: IB Security Assistant/Executive Result 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), has released a notification for the recruitment of Security Assistant/Executive posts for the year 2025. A total of 4987 vacancies are available across various states and Union Territories. Candidates must have passed 10th standard, possess knowledge of the local language/dialect, and hold a domicile certificate of the region applied for. The post offers a Level-3 pay scale (₹21,700 – ₹69,100) along with special allowances. This is a central government Group ‘C’ non-gazetted, non-ministerial post, offering job security and growth in the intelligence sector. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official portal before the last date.

item.title: MPESB Group 1 Subgroup 2 Online Form 2025
item.description: MPESB Group 1 Subgroup 2 Recruitment 2025 has been announced for a total of 474 various posts under different departments of the Government of Madhya Pradesh. Candidates having a postgraduate degree in the relevant subject as per departmental recruitment rules are eligible to apply. The online application process will start from 24 December 2025 and will remain open till 07 January 2026 through the official website esb.mp.gov.in. The selection will be conducted through a written examination followed by further procedures as mentioned in the official notification.

item.title: UP Police Computer Operator Grade-A Online Form 2025
item.description: Police Computer Operator Grade-A Recruitment 2025 has been announced by the Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) for a total of 1352 vacancies. The recruitment is for the post of Police Computer Operator Grade-A. Eligible candidates who have passed Intermediate (10+2) and possess a valid computer qualification certificate can apply online from 16/12/2025 to 15/01/2026 through the official UPPRPB website. Selection will be done through a written examination followed by document verification, as per the official notification.

item.title: DSSSB Multi Tasking Staff (MTS) Online Form 2025
item.description: DSSSB MTS Recruitment 2025 has been announced for 714 Multi-Tasking Staff (Group-C) posts in various Delhi Government departments. Eligible 10th pass candidates can apply online from 17 December 2025 to 15 January 2026. Selection will be through a CBT exam with negative marking.

item.title: UPSSSC Lekhpal Online Form 2025
item.description: UPSSSC Lekhpal Recruitment 2025 has been announced for a total of 7994 vacancies under the Revenue Department, Government of Uttar Pradesh. Candidates who have passed Intermediate (10+2) and qualified in UPSSSC PET 2025 are eligible to apply online from 29 December 2025 to 28 January 2026, with the selection conducted through the main examination as per the official notification.

item.title: Nainital Bank PO, SO & CSA Online Form 2025
item.description: Nainital Bank Recruitment 2025 has been announced for 185 vacancies including CSA, PO, and Specialist Officer posts. The online application window is open from 12 December 2025 to 01 January 2026, and the written exam will be conducted on 18 January 2026. Eligible graduates, postgraduates, MBA, and CA candidates can apply as per the post requirements. The selection process includes an online examination followed by an interview.

item.title: SSC GD Constable Online Form 2026
item.description: The SSC GD Constable Recruitment 2026 has been announced for a total of 25,487 vacancies across various forces. The online application process will be conducted from 01/12/2025 to 31/12/2025. Candidates must have passed Class 10th (Matriculation) to be eligible. The selection process includes a Computer-Based Examination (CBT), Physical Efficiency Test (PET), Physical Standard Test (PST), and Medical Examination. The application fee is ₹100 for General/OBC/EWS, while SC/ST, Female, and Ex-Servicemen candidates are exempted from the fee. Detailed force-wise vacancies, age limit, physical standards, and exam pattern are provided in the official notification.

item.title: Delhi Police Constable 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the Delhi Police Constable (Executive) Recruitment 2025 notification for 7565 vacancies. Both male and female candidates can apply online from 22 September to 21 October 2025. The recruitment process includes a Computer-Based Examination, followed by Physical Endurance & Measurement Tests (PE&MT). Eligible candidates must have passed 10+2, and male applicants must hold a valid LMV driving license. The pay scale is Level-3 (₹21,700 – ₹69,100). Reserved categories and women candidates are exempted from the application fee.

item.title: Assam Police Constable Online Form 2025
item.description: Assam Police ने Constable (UB) के 1052 और Constable (AB) के 663 पदों के लिए भर्ती प्रक्रिया शुरू की है। आवेदन 16/12/2025 से 16/01/2026 तक बिना किसी शुल्क के किए जा सकेंगे। केवल Assam के Permanent Residents जिनका Employment Exchange Registration Assam में है, वही आवेदन कर सकते हैं। UB के लिए 12th pass और AB के लिए 10th pass आवश्यक है। चयन प्रक्रिया में PST, PET, Written Exam और Viva शामिल हैं।

item.title: Bombay High Court Online Form 2025
item.description: Bombay High Court Recruitment 2025 में कुल 2381 पदों पर भर्ती निकली है, जिसमें Clerk, Peon, Driver और Stenographer शामिल हैं। आवेदन 15 दिसंबर 2025 से 5 जनवरी 2026 तक ऑनलाइन स्वीकार किए जाएंगे। पात्र उम्मीदवार Graduation, 10th Pass या 7th Pass योग्यता अनुसार आवेदन कर सकते हैं।

item.title: BSSC Inter Level Online Form 2025
item.description: Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has released the notification for the Inter Level Combined Competitive Exam 2025 with 23,175 vacancies across various departments. Eligible candidates can register online from 15th October 2025 to 25th November 2025, while the final submission deadline is 27th November 2025. The minimum qualification required is Intermediate (10+2) or equivalent along with computer knowledge and typing skills. This is one of the biggest recruitment drives in Bihar offering opportunities for thousands of aspirants.

item.title: Delhi DDA Recruitment 2025- Admit Card Out
item.description: The Delhi Development Authority (DDA) has released its Recruitment Notification 2025 for a total of 1732 vacancies across various posts including Deputy Director, Assistant Director, Junior Engineer, Stenographer, Patwari, Mali, and Multi Tasking Staff (MTS). The online application process is scheduled from 06 October 2025 to 05 November 2025, and the Computer Based Test (CBT) is expected in December 2025 – January 2026. Candidates can apply online through the official DDA website. The recruitment includes category-wise vacancies (UR, EWS, SC, ST, OBC) and posts for ESM / PwBD candidates. Qualifications vary by post, ranging from 10th/12th pass to Graduate/Degree holders in relevant fields.

item.title: MPPGCL Plant Assistant Online Form 2025
item.description: MPPGCL has released the notification for Plant Assistant Recruitment 2025 with a total of 90 vacancies for Mechanical (53) and Electrical (37) posts. Only male candidates with ITI qualification can apply. The online application process will run from 01/12/2025 to 30/12/2025. Selection will be based on a Computer Based Test followed by document verification. Salary will be provided as per Level-6 after successful training and probation.

item.title: Delhi Police Constable Driver 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for Delhi Police Constable (Driver) – Male Recruitment 2025 with 737 vacancies. Applications can be submitted online from 24/09/2025 to 15/10/2025. Candidates must have 10+2 qualification, a valid Heavy Motor Vehicle (HMV) driving license, and knowledge of vehicle maintenance.

item.title: AAI Junior Assistant & Senior Assistant Online Form 2025
item.description: AAI North Eastern Region has released the recruitment notification for 14 Non-Executive posts, including Senior Assistant (Electronics), Junior Assistant (HR), and Junior Assistant (Fire Services). Only candidates who are domicile of the North Eastern states—Assam, Arunachal Pradesh, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland, and Tripura—are eligible to apply. The online application process will remain open from 12 December 2025 to 11 January 2026. The selection process includes a Computer-Based Test (CBT), document verification, and physical/medical tests for Fire Services. Eligible candidates are advised to apply online through the AAI official website.

item.title: CBSE Group A B & C Posts Online Form 2026
item.description: CBSE has released the Direct Recruitment 2026 notification for 124 vacancies across Group A, B and C posts including Assistant Secretary, Assistant Professor, Accounts Officer, Superintendent, Junior Translation Officer, Junior Accountant and Junior Assistant. Eligible candidates can apply online from 02 December to 22 December 2025. Selection will be based on Tier-1 and Tier-2 examinations, followed by an interview or skill test as per the post.

item.title: SBI Bank Specialist Officer SO Online Form 2025
item.description: State Bank of India has released the Wealth Management Specialist Cadre Officer recruitment for VP Wealth (SRM), AVP Wealth (RM) and Customer Relationship Executive (CRE) posts. Online applications are open from 02 to 23 December 2025. Selection will be based on shortlisting and interview. Eligible candidates with the required qualification, experience and age criteria can apply online.

item.title: UP Police Assistant Operator Online Form 2025
item.description: UP Police has released the Assistant Operator Recruitment 2025 for 44 posts under the Police Radio Cadre. Eligible 12th PCM passed candidates aged 18–22 years can apply online from 03/12/2025 to 02/01/2026. The selection includes a written exam, PST, PET and document verification. Application fee is ₹500 for General/OBC/EWS and ₹400 for SC/ST.

item.title: Uttar Pradesh Home Guard Online Form 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Home Guard Recruitment 2025 has announced 41,424 vacancies for Home Guard (Male/Female) posts across all districts of the state. The online application process will run from 18 November 2025 to 17 December 2025. Candidates must have passed Class 10 (High School) from a recognized board and must be between 18 to 30 years of age as on 01 July 2025. The selection process includes Physical Standards Test (PST) and Physical Efficiency Test (PET), where male candidates must complete 4.8 km in 28 minutes and female candidates must complete 2.4 km in 16 minutes. The application fee is ₹400 for General/OBC/EWS and ₹300 for SC/ST candidates. The complete district-wise vacancy list and PET/PST rules are provided in the official notification.

item.title: IIMC Non-Teaching Online Form 2025
item.description: Indian Institute of Mass Communication (IIMC) has invited online applications for 51 non-teaching vacancies across Delhi and regional centres. Selection will be through written test and skill test (and interview for Group A posts). Online applications close on 12/01/2026 and hard copy must reach by 19/01/2026.

item.title: MPESB MP Police Constable Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh Professional Examination Board (MPESB) has announced the MP Police Constable Recruitment 2025 for a total of 7500 Constable (General Duty – SAF & DEF) posts. The online application process will start from 15/09/2025 and remain open till 29/09/2025, while the correction window will be available up to 04/10/2025. The written examination is scheduled to begin from 30/10/2025. Candidates applying for this recruitment must have passed 10th/12th (for UR/SC/OBC/EWS) or at least 8th standard (for ST candidates) from a recognized board. The minimum age limit is 18 years and the maximum is 33 years for general category male candidates, with age relaxations applicable for reserved categories and women as per rules. The application fee is ₹500 for UR, ₹250 for SC/ST/OBC/EWS (MP domicile), while departmental candidates need to pay ₹200 (UR) or ₹100 (reserved categories) along with applicable portal charges. This recruitment offers a great opportunity for candidates seeking a stable government job in the Madhya Pradesh Police Department.

item.title: BTSC Pump Operator Online Form 2025
item.description: BTSC Bihar has announced the Pump Operator Recruitment 2025 for a total of 191 vacancies. Candidates who have passed 10th (Matric) along with ITI in Machinist or Fitter trade are eligible to apply online from 12 December 2025 to 12 January 2026 through the official website btsc.bih.nic.in. The selection process will be conducted through a Computer Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification.

item.title: KVS NVS Teaching & Non-Teaching 2025 - Correction Window Open
item.description: KVS NVS Recruitment 2025 offers more than 14967 Teaching and Non-Teaching vacancies under Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan and Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti. Eligible candidates can apply online from 14/11/2025 to 04/12/2025 for posts such as PRT, TGT, PGT, Principal, Clerk, Stenographer, Librarian and others. The application fee is ₹1500 for General, OBC and EWS categories, while SC, ST, PwD and all female candidates are exempted from fees. Qualifications vary by post and include 10th, 12th, Graduation, Post Graduation, B.Ed, D.El.Ed and CTET. The selection process includes a computer-based test followed by document verification.

item.title: BTSC Dental Hygienist Online Form 2025
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has released the Dental Hygienist Recruitment 2025 notification for 702 posts under the Health Department. Eligible candidates with a Diploma in Dental Hygienist can apply online from 10 October to 10 November 2025. Selection will be based on a merit list prepared from academic qualifications. Check eligibility, salary, and application process below.

item.title: BTSC Hostel Manager Online Form 2025
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has released the Hostel Manager Recruitment 2025 notification for 91 posts under the Backward and Extremely Backward Class Welfare Department. Eligible candidates with a Bachelor’s Degree or Diploma in Hotel Management can apply online through the official website btsc.bihar.gov.in. The selection will be based on a written examination and document verification. Candidates are advised to check the eligibility criteria, age limit, and reservation details before submitting the online form.

item.title: BTSC Works Supervisor Online Form 2025
item.description: BTSC Works Supervisor Recruitment 2025 (Advt. 25/2025) is out for 1114 posts under PHED Bihar. Apply online from 10 Oct to 10 Nov 2025. Eligibility: Matric (10th) + ITI in Draughtsman (Civil) / Surveyor / Plumber. Selection via CBT (100 MCQs, 2 hrs, 0.25 negative); Level-2 pay; category-wise and 35% female (horizontal) reservation applicable.

item.title: BTSC Work Inspector Mechanical Online Form 2025
item.description: BTSC Bihar has announced the Work Inspector (Mechanical) Recruitment 2025 for 493 vacancies. Candidates with 10th pass and ITI qualification in Machinist, Fitter, Wireman or Electrician trades can apply online from 12 December 2025 to 12 January 2026 through the official website btsc.bihar.gov.in. Selection will be based on a Computer Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification.

item.title: BTSC Junior Engineer Online Form 2025
item.description: Bihar Junior Engineer Recruitment 2025–26 has been announced for 2809 regular vacancies, including 2653 Civil, 86 Electrical and 70 Mechanical posts. Eligible Diploma holders can apply online through BTSC from 12 December 2025 to 11 January 2026. The selection will be done through a Computer Based Test (CBT) followed by a merit list.

item.title: CCRH Research Officer & Other Posts Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Central Council for Research in Homoeopathy (CCRH), under the Ministry of AYUSH, Government of India, has released the CCRH Recruitment 2025 Notification (Advt. No. 179/2025-26) for 48 vacancies across Group A, B and C posts. Eligible candidates can apply online from 05 November 2025 to 26 November 2025 through the official websites - ccrhindia.ayush.gov.in, ccrhonline.in or eapplynow.com. The recruitment includes posts like Research Officer, Junior Librarian, Pharmacist, X-Ray Technician, LDC, and Driver. Selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (CBT) and an interview (for Group-A). Interested applicants should read the full notification for eligibility, qualification, age limit, and application fee details before applying.

item.title: CCRH Staff Nurse, MLT, Stenographer & ARO Admit Card 2025
item.description: Central Council for Research in Homoeopathy (CCRH) has released the official notification Advt. No. 180/2025-26 for 42 Group B & C vacancies including Staff Nurse, Medical Laboratory Technologist, Junior Stenographer, Junior MLT, and Assistant Research Officer (Pharmacognosy). The online application process will be open from 05/11/2025 to 26/11/2025. Candidates must apply through the official website www.ccrhindia.nic.in. The application fee is ₹500 for UR/OBC/EWS, while SC/ST/PwD/Female candidates are exempted. Selection will be based on a Computer Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification.

item.title: IAF AFCAT 01/2026 Batch Online Form 2025
item.description: The Indian Air Force (IAF) has announced the AFCAT 01/2026 Batch Recruitment 2025 for Flying and Ground Duty (Technical & Non-Technical) branches. The online application process will begin on 10 November 2025 and continue till 9 December 2025 through the official website afcat.cdac.in. Candidates holding a graduate or engineering degree with Physics and Mathematics at 10+2 level can apply. The selection process includes an online written test, AFSB interview, and medical examination. Successful candidates will join the AFCAT 01/2026 course commencing in January 2026 as Group-A Gazetted Officers in the Indian Air Force

item.title: RRB Section Controller Recruitment 2025- Application Status
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has announced 368 vacancies for Section Controller posts through CEN 04/2025. The online application process will be open from 15 September to 14 October 2025. Candidates with a graduation degree and age between 20 to 33 years can apply. Selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test, skill test (if required), document verification, and medical examination. The post offers a Level 6 pay scale with attractive allowances.

item.title: DRDO CEPTAM-11 Online Form 2025
item.description: DRDO CEPTAM-11 Recruitment 2025 has been announced for a total of 764 vacancies, including 561 posts for Senior Technical Assistant-B and 203 posts for Technician-A. The online application process will begin on 09 December 2025 and is expected to remain open until 08 January 2026. Eligible candidates can apply online after checking the required qualification, age limit, and fee details. The exam date will be notified later.

item.title: CSIR NCL Technician (1) & Technical Assistant Online Form 2025
item.description: CSIR–NCL Recruitment 2025 has announced 34 vacancies including 15 Technician (1) and 19 Technical Assistant posts. Eligible 10th+ITI, Diploma and B.Sc candidates can apply online from 12 December 2025 to 12 January 2026. Selection will be based on Trade Test and a three-paper written examination.

item.title: KVS LDE/LDCE Teaching and Non-Teaching Online Form 2025
item.description: KVS LDE/DE Recruitment 2026 has announced 2499 vacancies for Principal, Vice-Principal, PGT, TGT, Head Master, Finance Officer, Section Officer and Secretariat Assistant posts. Eligible KVS employees can apply online from 11 December 2025 to 26 December 2025, and the controlling officer verification will close on 02 January 2026. The LDE/DE examination is scheduled for 15 February 2026. No application fee is required for any category.

item.title: EMRS Teaching & Non-Teaching Admit Card 2025
item.description: The National Education Society for Tribal Students (NESTS) has announced the EMRS Recruitment 2025 (ESSE-2025) notification for a total of 7267 vacancies across teaching and non-teaching posts. The vacancies include Principal, PGT, TGT, Female Staff Nurse, Hostel Warden, Accountant, Junior Secretariat Assistant (JSA), and Lab Attendant. Candidates can apply online until 23rd October 2025, with application fees ranging from ₹500 to ₹2500 depending on the post and category. The eligibility criteria vary by position, requiring qualifications from 10th/12th to Graduate, Postgraduate, B.Ed., CTET, or professional degrees. The age limit is set between 30 to 50 years, with applicable relaxations for reserved categories. This recruitment provides a major opportunity for aspirants seeking teaching and non-teaching jobs in Eklavya Model Residential Schools (EMRS) across India.

item.title: SHS Bihar Ophthalmic Assistant Admit Card 2025
item.description: State Health Society Bihar is inviting applications for 220 Ophthalmic Assistant posts under Advt. No. 07/2025. Candidates with 10+2 in Biology/Mathematics and a 2-year Diploma in Optometry or Ophthalmic Assistant are eligible. The application window is open from 14 to 28 August 2025, with a monthly salary of ₹15,000. Selection will be through CBT, document verification, and medical examination.

item.title: SHS Bihar ANM Vacancy 2025 Admit Card Out
item.description: Bihar SHS is inviting online applications for 5,006 ANM vacancies under HSC, RBSK, and NUHM programs. Only female candidates with a 2-year ANM diploma and BNRC registration are eligible. Applications are open from 14 to 28 August 2025, with selection based on a CBT and document verification. The monthly salary is ₹15,000.

item.title: UPSC CDS 1 Online Form 2026
item.description: UPSC CDS (I) 2026 offers a total of 451 vacancies across IMA, INA, AFA and OTA. Eligible graduate candidates can apply online from 10 to 30 December 2025. The selection process includes a written exam, SSB interview and medical examination.

item.title: UPSC NDA 1 Online Form 2026
item.description: UPSC NDA & NA (I) 2026 offers a total of 394 vacancies across Army, Navy and Air Force wings. Eligible unmarried male and female candidates born between 02 July 2007 and 01 July 2010 with 10+2 qualification can apply online until 30 December 2025. Selection includes a written exam, SSB interview and medical test, with the final merit determining admission to NDA and Naval Academy courses starting January 2027.

item.title: MP Police ASI & Subedar Stenographer Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh Police Headquarters has announced 500 vacancies for Subedar (Stenographer) and Assistant Sub Inspector (Clerk) posts under direct and departmental recruitment. Eligible candidates with 12th pass and computer proficiency (CPCT/Hindi Typing) can apply online via MPESB from 03 October to 17 October 2025. The written exam will start on 10 December 2025. Reservation benefits and age relaxation are applicable only for MP domicile candidates.

item.title: UPPSC Assistant Teacher Bharti 2025 Answer Key Out
item.description: The Directorate of Medical Education and Research (DMER) has announced a recruitment drive for 7466 Assistant Teacher posts. Candidates must hold a Bachelor’s Degree in the relevant subject from any recognized university in India. Detailed eligibility criteria and subject-wise qualifications will be released soon. Interested applicants are advised to stay updated with the official notification and prepare to apply online as per the given schedule.

item.title: IBPS SO XV 15th Mains Result 2025 Out
item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for the Specialist Officer (SO) CRP SPL-XV Recruitment 2025. A total of 1007 vacancies have been announced for various Scale I posts including IT Officer, Agriculture Field Officer (AFO), Rajbhasha Adhikari, Law Officer, HR/Personnel Officer, and Marketing Officer. The online application process will be open from 1st July 2025 to 21st July 2025. The Preliminary Examination is scheduled for August 2025, followed by the Main Examination in November 2025. Interviews are likely to be conducted in January/February 2026. Applications will be accepted in online mode only. For more details and to apply, visit the official website www.ibps.in.

item.title: SSC 10+2 CHSL 2025 Answer Key Out
item.description: कर्मचारी चयन आयोग (SSC) द्वारा CHSL (10+2) भर्ती 2025 का नोटिफिकेशन जारी किया गया है। इस भर्ती के अंतर्गत लोअर डिवीजन क्लर्क (LDC), डाटा एंट्री ऑपरेटर (DEO), डाक सहायक (PA) व छंटाई सहायक (SA) जैसे पदों पर नियुक्तियाँ की जाएंगी। भारत के किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त बोर्ड से 12वीं (इंटरमीडिएट) उत्तीर्ण उम्मीदवार इसके लिए आवेदन कर सकते हैं। आवेदन प्रक्रिया पूरी तरह ऑनलाइन है।

item.title: WBBPE Assistant Teacher Online Form 2025
item.description: The West Bengal Board of Primary Education (WBBPE) has released the official notification for 13,421 Assistant Teacher (Primary) posts in Government and Government-aided schools. The online application process will run from 19 November 2025 (3:00 PM) to 9 December 2025 (11:59 PM). Candidates with 12th + D.El.Ed or B.El.Ed are eligible. The application fee is ₹600 for General, ₹500 for OBC, and ₹300 for SC/ST/PH applicants. Selection will be based on merit, interview, and document verification.

item.title: RRB Paramedical Staff Application Status 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB), Ministry of Railways, Government of India, has released the Centralized Employment Notice (CEN No. 03/2025) for Paramedical Categories Recruitment 2025 with a total of 434 vacancies across various posts including Nursing Superintendent, Pharmacist, Dialysis Technician, ECG Technician, Radiographer, and Lab Assistant. The online application process will begin on 09 August 2025 and will remain open until 08 September 2025 (11:59 PM). The educational qualifications vary by post, ranging from 10+2 with Diploma/Certificate to B.Sc. in relevant fields, and the age limit is 18 to 40 years as on 01 January 2026. The selected candidates will receive a salary ranging between ₹21,700 and ₹44,900 as per the 7th CPC Pay Matrix (Level 2 to Level 7). The selection process will consist of a Computer Based Test (CBT), Document Verification, and a Medical Examination. Candidates can apply through the official RRB regional websites such as rrbahmedabad.gov.in and others.

item.title: Haryana Medical Officer Online Form 2025
item.description: Health Department Haryana has announced 450 vacancies for Medical Officer (HCMS-I) posts. MBBS-qualified candidates with valid medical registration can apply online from 08 December 2025 to 07 January 2026. The age limit is 22–35 years with category-wise relaxations. Application fee ranges from NIL to ₹1000 depending on category.

item.title: Railway RRB Technician Application Status 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released the RRB Technician Recruitment 2025 notification for Technician Grade-1 (Signal) and Technician Grade-3 (Open Line) posts. Around 6238 vacancies will be filled. Grade-1 requires a B.Sc, BE/B.Tech or 3-year diploma in Physics, Electronics, Computer Science, IT, or Instrumentation. Grade-3 requires 10th pass with ITI in relevant trade from NCVT/SCVT. Eligible candidates can apply online. Please read the official notification for full details.

item.title: CGPSC Assistant Professor Online Form 2025
item.description: CGPSC Assistant Professor (Medical Education) Recruitment 2025 के तहत कुल 125 पदों के लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन आमंत्रित किए गए हैं। आवेदन 25 नवंबर से 24 दिसंबर 2025 तक स्वीकार किए जाएंगे। इस भर्ती में संबंधित मेडिकल स्पेशलिटी में MD/MS/DNB योग्यता और न्यूनतम 1 वर्ष का Senior Resident अनुभव आवश्यक है। Chhattisgarh domicile उम्मीदवारों के लिए फीस में छूट और परीक्षा में उपस्थित होने पर फीस रिफंड का प्रावधान है।

item.title: CGPSC SSE Online Form 2025
item.description: CGPSC SSE 2025 भर्ती में कुल 238 पद जारी किए गए हैं। आवेदन 01 से 30 दिसंबर 2025 तक ऑनलाइन होंगे। योग्यता स्नातक, आयु सीमा 21–30 वर्ष (CG Domicile: 35 वर्ष) है। चयन प्रक्रिया में Pre, Mains और Interview शामिल हैं। SC/ST/OBC के लिए आवेदन शुल्क ₹300 और अन्य सभी के लिए ₹400 है।

item.title: IB Multi Tasking Staff Online Form 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau has released the IB MTS Recruitment 2025 notification for 362 Multi-Tasking Staff (General) posts across various SIBs in India. Candidates who have passed Class 10 and possess a valid state domicile certificate can apply online from 22/11/2025 to 14/12/2025. The selection process includes a Tier-I objective exam and a Tier-II descriptive exam. Application fees are ₹650 for General/OBC/EWS male applicants and ₹550 for all other categories.

item.title: Delhi Police Head Constable 2025 - Self Slot Booking

item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs, has released the official notification for IB ACIO-II/Technical Recruitment 2025. A total of 258 vacancies are available for disciplines in Computer Science & Information Technology and Electronics & Communication. Eligible candidates with valid GATE 2023, 2024, or 2025 scores can apply online from 25/10/2025 to 16/11/2025 through www.mha.gov.in. The recruitment includes Level-7 pay scale (₹44,900–₹1,42,400), with additional security allowances and other benefits. Selection will be based on GATE score, Skill Test, and Interview.

item.title: ISRO SAC Group C Online Form 2025
item.description: Space Applications Centre (SAC), Ahmedabad – Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) has released a recruitment notification for 55 vacancies of Technician ‘B’ and Pharmacist ‘A’ under Group ‘C’ posts. Eligible candidates can apply online through sac.gov.in from 24 October 2025 to 13 November 2025. The recruitment includes various trades such as Fitter, Machinist, Electrician, Electronics Mechanic, IT/ICTSM, Lab Assistant (Chemical Plant) and Refrigeration & Air Conditioning. The selection process consists of a Written Test followed by a Skill Test (qualifying nature). Salary: Level 3 (₹21,700–₹69,100) for Technician B and Level 5 (₹29,200–₹92,300) for Pharmacist A Age Limit: 18–35 years (as on 13/11/2025) Qualification: 10th Pass + ITI/NTC/NAC in relevant trade or Diploma in Pharmacy (First Class)

item.title: SBI SCO Wealth Management Online Form 2025
item.description: State Bank of India (SBI) has released the official notification for Wealth Management Recruitment 2025 under the Specialist Cadre Officer (SCO) category. A total of 103 vacancies are available for posts like Head, Zonal Head, Regional Head, Relationship Manager, Investment Specialist, Investment Officer, and others. Eligible candidates can apply online from 27/10/2025 to 17/11/2025 through the official website sbi.bank.in/web/careers. The selection will be based on a personal interview only.

item.title: SEBI Assistant Manager Grade A Online Form 2025
item.description: Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has released the SEBI Officer Grade A (Assistant Manager) Recruitment 2025 notification for 110 vacancies across various streams including General, Legal, IT, Research, Official Language, Civil, and Electrical Engineering. The online application process will be open from 30/10/2025 to 28/11/2025. The Phase-I exam is scheduled for 10/01/2026 and Phase-II for 21/02/2026. Candidates must possess a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in relevant disciplines and be below 30 years of age as on 30/09/2025. The selection process consists of Phase-I, Phase-II, and Interview. The pay scale ranges from ₹62,500 to ₹1,26,100 with an approximate gross salary of ₹1.84 lakh per month (without accommodation). Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website www.sebi.gov.in.

item.title: MPHC Data Processing Assistant Online Form 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh High Court (MPHC) has announced the Data Processing Assistant (DPA) Recruitment 2025 under advertisement S2A/Exam/DPA/2025 for 41 vacancies. Eligible candidates with a BCA or B.Sc. (Computer Science/IT) degree and at least 60% marks, along with 3 years of data entry experience, can apply online from 29/10/2025 to 19/11/2025 through mphc.gov.in. The selection process includes a Preliminary Exam, Practical Test, and Interview, and the final merit will be based on Practical and Interview marks. The pay scale is ₹5200–20200 + Grade Pay ₹2400, and the application fees are ₹943.40 for UR and ₹743.40 for Reserved categories.

item.title: NHAI Various Posts Recruitment 2025 – Apply Online
item.description: The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has released a notification for direct recruitment 2025 under the Ministry of Road Transport & Highways. Eligible candidates can apply online for various posts including Deputy Manager (Finance & Accounts), Accountant, Stenographer, Library Assistant, and Junior Translation Officer. The application process starts from 30/10/2025 and continues till 15/12/2025. Candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully before applying at nhai.gov.in

item.title: UPPSC APO Recruitment 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released the official notification for Assistant Prosecution Officer (APO) Recruitment 2025 with 182 vacancies. Eligible candidates with a Law degree (LLB) can apply online from 16 September 2025 to 16 October 2025 through the UPPSC portal. The selection process includes Prelims, Mains, and Interview, followed by document verification and medical examination. Applicants must be between 21 to 40 years of age as on 1 July 2025. The pay scale ranges from Rs. 47,600 to Rs. 1,51,100, offering a great career opportunity for law graduates in Uttar Pradesh.

item.title: Rajasthan Police Constable Sports Quota Bharti 2025
item.description: Rajasthan Police has announced 167 Sports Quota Constable vacancies for 2025. Applications will be accepted online between 12th September and 1st October 2025. Selection will consider CET 2024 score, sports performance, and physical criteria.

item.title: RSSB Village Development Officer VDO 2025 Online Form
item.description: राजस्थान कर्मचारी चयन बोर्ड (RSSB) द्वारा ग्राम विकास अधिकारी (VDO) पदों पर भर्ती के लिए अधिसूचना जारी कर दी गई है। इच्छुक और पात्र उम्मीदवार जो भारत के किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त विश्वविद्यालय से स्नातक हैं और जिनके पास O लेवल, COPA, DPCS, कंप्यूटर डिप्लोमा या RS-CIT प्रमाण पत्र है, वे इस भर्ती के लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। भर्ती से जुड़ी पात्रता, आयु सीमा, आवेदन तिथि, चयन प्रक्रिया और अन्य जानकारी के लिए आधिकारिक नोटिफिकेशन जरूर पढ़ें।

item.title: HRRL Various Posts Vacancy 2025
item.description: Hindustan Petroleum Rajasthan Refinery Limited (HRRL) has released a recruitment notification for 131 vacancies across various departments including Engineering (Chemical, Mechanical, Electrical, Civil, Instrumentation), HR, Finance, Legal, Fire & Safety, and Medical.

item.title: RSSB Lab Attendant Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has released the notification for Lab Attendant (Prayogshala Sahayak) Recruitment 2025. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website. This recruitment is a great opportunity for 10th pass candidates seeking government jobs in Rajasthan. Applicants must have a valid domicile of Rajasthan to claim reservation benefits; candidates from other states can apply under the unreserved category (UR). The selection process will include a written examination followed by document verification. Interested candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully and apply before the last date.

item.title: Rajasthan High Court Class IV (Peon) Vacancy 2025 - Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan High Court Class IV (Peon) Recruitment 2025 के अंतर्गत राजस्थान उच्च न्यायालय द्वारा चपरासी (Class IV) पदों पर भर्ती के लिए अधिसूचना जारी की गई है (विज्ञापन संख्या: रा.उ.न्या.जो./परीक्षा प्रकोष्ठ/अधीनस्थ न्यायालय/च.श्रे.क./2025/2349)। इस भर्ती के लिए अभ्यर्थी को किसी मान्यता प्राप्त बोर्ड से 10वीं (माध्यमिक) उत्तीर्ण होना आवश्यक है। साथ ही देवनागरी लिपि में हिंदी का व्यावहारिक ज्ञान और राजस्थान की संस्कृति की जानकारी भी अनिवार्य है। इस भर्ती में राजस्थान राज्य के अभ्यर्थी आवेदन कर सकते हैं, साथ ही अन्य राज्यों के उम्मीदवार भी आवेदन कर सकते हैं, लेकिन उन्हें अनारक्षित श्रेणी (Unreserved Category) में माना जाएगा और किसी प्रकार का आरक्षण प्राप्त नहीं होगा। आवेदन प्रक्रिया पूरी तरह ऑनलाइन होगी और विस्तृत जानकारी व आवेदन के लिए आधिकारिक वेबसाइट hcraj.nic.in पर विज़िट करें।

item.title: Rajasthan HC Driver Recruitment 2025 Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan High Court has officially released the notification for Driver Recruitment 2025, inviting applications for a total of 58 vacancies. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official website hcraj.nic.in from 18 June to 7 July 2025. This recruitment drive offers a great opportunity for candidates seeking government jobs in the driving sector under the Rajasthan judiciary. Applicants are advised to carefully read the eligibility criteria, application process, and important dates mentioned in the official notification before applying.

item.title: BSSC Field Assistant 2025 Apply Form
item.description: फील्ड असिस्टेंट (कृषि विभाग) भर्ती 2025
